name: Artefact (Azertinv)
description:
Your job is to reverse engineer an alien piece of technology.

Fill in the report with what you discover and understand the inner workings of this artefact.

The report will check your work and validate it once you have 3 right answers.

Click on the report answers to fill them. You can press ESCAPE in the prompt to cancel it.

This a REALLY early prototype for a "puzzle" game idea I had a couple of months ago but never got around to it, so here it is now. Progress isn't saved at the moment and there is no art, welcome to placeholder land.

Since this is a knowledge based puzzle game, watching somebody else play will spoil it for you. I recommend playing it on your own or back seating with a streamer.

In the future I will make a fully fledged CPU to reverse-engineer.
